Name: Lil Splody: Look Out Below!
About the game: Zodac and his minions are wreaking havoc and it's up to you to stop them! Lil Splody: Look Out Below! is a casual-arcade style game, where you dodge and blow up falling enemies in an attempt to rescue your fellow bomblings! This is Splody. A little explosive creature known as a bombling. Splody's friends have been captured by the evil intergalactic warlord Zodac and he needs your help to rescue them! Avoid being crushed by falling enemies, demolish your foes and various obstacles by using your exploding ability, and collect shield chips (in game currency) as you visit different worlds, each with its own unique boss battle – all while competing to blast your friends and the worlds highscores away, leaving them in your dust! • Explode onto the leaderboards in single player mode • Up to 4 player PvP split-screen action • Rescue and play as 6 different bomblings, each with their own unique stats • 5 levels to unlock and enjoy • Show your style by equipping costumes • Controller supported
